name: Chemical Kinectics Solver
short_description:
This the beginning of a very basic chemical kinetics solver for chemkin style mechanisms.

At the moment, this solver is very limited and draws on the Intel ODE library.
The library is NOT included and has to be downloaded separately from the Intel Website. Alternatively you are free to use your own ODE solver, such as LSODA or others.

The compiled executable is for 64Bit Windows.
